shadowverse:RadiantLuminousMage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack card with Evolve, Upgrades itself or that can be Upgraded multiple times, put 1 *Evolution *Point into your hand. NL When this card is drawn, put 1 *Evolution *Point to your hand.

shadowverse:CourtlyDance.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! attack with Evolve, Upgrade themselves or can be Upgraded multiple times from the draw pile to your hand, then upgrade them.

shadowverse:Troya.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have played at least 2 cards this turn, draw 1 card. NL If you have played 2 Upgraded or Evolve cards this turn, Upgrade this card. NL Evolve.

shadowverse:AngelChoice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Select an Attack card in your hand. If it is a *Dark *Angel, gain 2 Strength and Dexterity, Exhaust it and add the corresponding *Angel to your hand. NL Otherwise, Exhaust the selected card and add 1 *Fallen *Angel+ to your hand.
